name: Cards Dungeon
description:
THE PLOT

The last greatest hero has fallen, and the quest called for adventurers. You're on a 7-day journey to the most challenging dungeon in the realm.

FEATURES + Random Everything!

Every event is random. However, the outcome can be decided by your attributes.

+ Simple Controls

Just click your mouse or tap on the screen.

+ Unfinished

This is a prototype, but you still can have fun!

AND MORE

Check out my other games, if you want play something that is finished. ;)
